ygData.subject: Re: Charges of items
ygData.msgSnippet: Depends on the item.  Examples. . . -Wooly spider silk -- (i think) has 2 charges of ensnaring roots.  No way to recharge. -Squad ring (heal). . rechargeable
ygData.messageBody:
Depends on the item. Examples. . .
-Wooly spider silk -- (i think) has 2 charges of ensnaring roots. No way to
recharge.
-Squad ring (heal). . rechargeable unlimited times (granted you dont mind
the walk)
-Glimmer ring (gate). . can be recharged for a fee

Im sure that there are lots of items that can be recharged that no one knows
about yet. . like the observer staff. . .Im sure that somewhere there is a
way to recharge it. Maybe not. . .more will unfold as people do more quests
and such.

Okay now Im rambling. . .hope this helps.

Demur
